text:
OkCupid Labs (www.okcupidlabs.com) - San Francisco, CA

We're building new products that connect people in love, life, work, and beyond. We assemble as small product teams that work fast, have fun, and ship often. We're looking for product-minded engineers to join us.

Current openings:

  - Frontend Engineers

  - Fullstack Engineers

  - Dev Ops Engineers
Check us out: http://jobs.okcupidlabs.com/
